list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: shape or force (something straight) into a curve or angle.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the rising wind bent the long grass

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person) incline the body downward from the vertical.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi cúi xuống đĩa của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: force or be forced to submit.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they want to bend me to their will
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ muốn uốn tôi vào ý muốn của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: direct or devote (one's attention or energies) to a task.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Eric bent all his efforts to persuading them to donate some blankets
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Eric uốn cong tất cả những nỗ lực của mình để thuyết phục họ tặng một số chăn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: attach (a sail or rope) by means of a knot.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: sailors were bending sails to the spars
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các thủy thủ đang uốn cong những cánh buồm đến xà leng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a curve, especially a sharp one, in a road, river, racecourse, or path.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the van screeched around a bend
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chiếc xe đã rít lên xung quanh một khúc cua

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a curved or angled part or form of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: making a bend in the wire
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Làm một uốn cong trong dây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a kind of knot used to join two ropes, or to tie a rope to another object, e.g. a carrick bend.
an ordinary in the form of a broad diagonal stripe from top left (dexter chief) to bottom right (sinister base) of a shield or part of one.
